crouch.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to lower your body close to the ground by bending your knees completely
crouch.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He crouched in the shadows near the doorway.
Paula crouched down and held her hands out to the fire.
crouch.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to bend over something so that you are very near to it
crouch.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: a young girl crouched over a book
